name: Dagger of the Swift
description: A small, lightweight dagger that allows for quick and precise strikes.
looks: The dagger has a slender, curved blade with intricate engravings. The hilt is wrapped in black leather, providing a secure grip.

special_effects.swift_strikes: Allows the wielder to perform additional attacks in rapid succession.

name: Speed Potion
description: A potion that increases the drinker's movement speed for a short duration.
looks: The potion is a translucent green liquid that shimmers and sparkles.

name: Poison Resistance Ring
description: A ring that grants resistance to poison damage.
looks: The ring is made of silver and has a green gemstone in the center.

name: Healing Staff
description: A magical staff that can be used to heal and restore health.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood with intricate carvings and a crystal orb at the top.

name: Invisibility Potion
description: A potion that makes the user invisible for a short period of time.
looks: The potion is a transparent, shimmering liquid in a small glass vial.

special_effects.Invisibility: Grants invisibility to the user for a certain duration.

name: Invisibility Cloak
description: A cloak that grants the wearer the ability to become invisible for a short period of time.
looks: The cloak is made of a shimmering silver fabric that seems to blend into the surroundings.

special_effects.Invisibility: Grants the wearer the ability to become invisible for a short period of time.

name: Elemental Staff
description: A staff infused with the power of the elements.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood with intricate carvings of fire, water, air, and earth. It emanates a faint glow and crackles with energy.

special_weapon_skills.elemental_magic: Allows the wielder to cast powerful elemental spells.

name: Health Restoration Potion
description: A potion that restores a small amount of health.
looks: The potion is a small glass vial filled with a glowing blue liquid.

name: Strength Potion
description: A potion that temporarily boosts the drinker's strength and melee damage.
looks: The potion is a vibrant red color, swirling with energy.

name: Energy Potion
description: A potion that grants a burst of energy, increasing movement speed and stamina regeneration.
looks: The potion is a small flask filled with a sparkling yellow liquid.

name: Amulet of Healing
description: An amulet that grants healing abilities to the wearer.
looks: The amulet is made of golden chain with a small crystal pendant.

special_effects.Healing Aura: Grants a small healing aura to the wearer.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the fireball spell.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment, with the words 'Fireball' written in bold letters.

special_effects.Fireball: Casts a fireball spell that deals fire damage to enemies.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll that allows the user to cast a powerful fireball spell.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment and is tied with a crimson ribbon.

special_effects.fireball: Unleashes a fireball that explodes on impact, dealing fire damage to all enemies within range.

name: Explosive Fireball
description: A powerful explosive fireball that causes massive damage to enemies.
looks: The fireball is a burning sphere of intense heat and flame.

special_effects.Burn: Causes target to burn for additional damage over time.

name: Astral Staff
description: A powerful staff imbued with celestial energy.
looks: The staff is made of polished oak with intricate carvings of stars and moons. It emits a faint glow.

special_weapon_skils.staff_combat: Increases damage and accuracy with staffs.

special_effects.celestial_burst: Has a chance to unleash a burst of celestial energy that damages all enemies in range.
